Html:
Hi,

I am using your WASP plugin, and it's proving very useful for automating a legacy app with no command line interface.

Unfortunately, the sending of Keys and mouse Clicks to another app can provie a a bit hit-and-miss due to Windoze timing variance.

Is there a switch for SendKeys that will exhibit behaviour similar to .Net SendWait function when sending to another application:

http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms171548.aspx

Thanks for a great app!

Jay.
